name: Space Shuttle: Meteor Impact
description:
Try to stop a Gigantic Meteor with your Space Shuttle and Save the Earth.


Hades, a Gigantic Meteor is heading towards Earth. Your Mission is to stop it during its course.

The impact would have a force of thousands megatonnes of TNT and cause a massive explosion, tsunamis and change the climate of the globe, devastating all life forms.

To avoid the Armageddon, NASA Scientists have moved closer to being able to stop it and created Liberty, a New Generation of Space Shuttle. Unlike the oldest generation of Shuttles like Challenger, Discovery, Columbia or Atlantis. Liberty is equiped with Orion III, a Nuclear-Propulsion Engine with massive performance.

You are the Captain of this new Shuttle and your Objective is to land on Hades and blow it up with Four Nuclear Devices. But your task will not be easy, you will have to fly through many Asteroids Fields and keep watching your indicators carefully.

Remember, the Future of Humanity is at stake.

Are you brave enough to face this Challenge?


Space Shuttle: Meteor Impact is a runner game developed by Wolferos in 2016 and powered by the Wolf Engine that can render incredible graphics, dynamic environments and stunning visual effects.
